// client/src/components/About.jsx import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const teamMembers = [ { name: "Thomas Müller", role: "CEO & Founder", description: "With over 15 years of experience in German real estate, Thomas founded Hausgold to create a more transparent and user-friendly property market.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603415526960-f8f0a4f3f6f3?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", // Older successful man }, { name: "Sarah Becker", role: "CTO", description: "Sarah leads our technology team, ensuring our platform is secure, reliable, and constantly evolving to meet our users' needs.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1607746882042-944635dfe10e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", // Corporate older woman }, { name: "Michael Wagner", role: "Head of Operations", description: "Michael ensures our day-to-day operations run smoothly, from customer service to property verification and listing management.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1595152772835-219674b2a8a6?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", // Mature businessman }, ]; const About = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* Header */}

About Hausgold

Germany's most trusted real estate platform, connecting buyers, renters, and sellers since 2025.

{/* Mission */}

Our Mission

At Hausgold, we're revolutionizing the German real estate market by providing a transparent, user-friendly platform that connects property seekers with their perfect homes.

We believe everyone deserves to find their ideal property without the stress and complexity traditionally associated with real estate transactions.

Our commitment to security, transparency, and exceptional customer service sets us apart in the industry.

{/* Team */}

Our Leadership Team

{teamMembers.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.description}

))}
{/* Values */} {/* (Keep your Core Values section as is, since it’s already clean) */} {/* CTA */}

Join Us in Transforming German Real Estate

Whether you're looking to buy, rent, or sell a property, Hausgold is here to make the process simple, secure, and stress-free.

); }; export default About;
